{g     | {8Do not in your arrogance allow the Sagacus   {g|

{g     | {8solitude it shall, without so much as a      {g|

{g     |                        {w-{8Valine Sagacus       {g|

description: Statues are lined up back to back in this
area of the tower.  Facing away from each
other, they maintain the same stoic stare
as the other statues. Yet something seems
different - it could be that perhaps they
are a little shorter, or maybe their eyes
glow a little less brightly.  Or possibly
this is just another trick of this Tower.{X

32937.name: {RH{rouse {YF{yoyer{x
description: {wWhile most houses in this ward are made with extravagance, this one
is very simple and out of place.  This foyer is different, however,
which is comparably a great waste of space.  A coatrack stands to the
right.  {x

a songbird chirps, a gentle breeze blows,
the view is of gardens and lush grassy meadows
bright patches of light dance across the floor
they search for a partner, and head for the door
the scattering clouds waltz with the stars above
and all of these visions are what dreams are made of.

32395.name: {@T{2he {^S{7taircase{& in the {!W{1all{X
description: {wSmaller and smaller, the features of the ground below blend into a
myriad of colors on a canvas made of earthen tones.  The gardens of
the courtyard seem lush and colorful, and there is the occasional bird
that can be heard in the distance, calling from great heights to the
spectacle which it has so much freedom to behold.  {x

32365.name: {WP{ga{yt{wh {xto {cBl{8ac{wks{Wtaf{wf T{8ow{cer{x
description: {cAs the tower becomes more visible, it is clear why the citizens of
Waterdeep don't make much of a fuss about it.  It's a simple tower
with no windows or even decorations lining the matte black surface.
It seems far away from here, yet you can make out details in the
granite surface.  The path continues straight ahead to the west.  {x

32596.name: {YE{wlegant {RD{rining {RH{rall {8of {cBl{8a{wc{Wks{wt{8a{cff{x
description: {x
{rThe supports which rise along the walls are carved in the
most intricate patterns, all done perhaps by the talented
artisans of the dwarven kingdom. Between each there hangs
a banner of one of the major powers of the realms. As the
number of available spaces overnumber the amount of major
powers in the realms, several banners are just decoration
and serve as placeholders for newcomers to take the stage.{x

32440.name: {wCh{8amb{wer {bof {wDa{8rkne{wss{x
description: {x
{8The walls are presumably stone, but difficult
to discern even when the light is shone right
upon them. They feel warm to the touch, which
is not like any stone you know of natural. In
the darkness, there can be seen nothing. Only
the sounds of your own clanking equipment can
be heard amidst deafening silence, though you
can almost hear something stirring, southward.{x

32970.name: {BBasement {w- {MResearch{x
description: {m
A narrow hallway extends this basement floor eastward,
where more rooms spur off each representing a viewing
room for the immortals to conduct research on mortals.
There is little else to hint at what this research is
about. The walls are barren, the floors clean, and in
the air is not a hint of smells.  In fact, this place
is devoid of sense and in that much it makes no sense,
for here sits just a fingertip out of touch with what
one would call normal.  Small beams of light dance in
all of the directions, save to the west were you came.{x

description: {x
{8You walk along talking to yourself in hopes it will end soon.{x

description: {r
The red tints play tricks on the eyes. Everything in
it takes on a reddish glow, including the light. The
air is stale and rather uncomfortable to breathe, as
it is saturated with these fine particulate minerals.{x

32821.name: {mC{rh{ya{Ym{yb{re{mr {8of {YC{yo{8n{mf{ru{ms{8i{yo{Yn{x
description: {b
You find yourself floating in immense nothingness, reminiscent
of the Void, though there is an aura of magic in the air about
you. Along all directions you are pulled, though the strongest
remains downward towards the world. With your bearings in tact,
you move through the expanse in hopes of finding your way back.{x

32718.name: {RRe{rd {rCa{8v{yern{8s {bBelow {cBl{8a{wc{Wks{wt{8a{cff{x

The red tints play tricks on the eyes. Everything in

{8The maze is composed of narrow corridors that turn around
{8sharp corners.  The only light available is from whatever
{8light adventurers bring along with them.  This seems more
{8like an underground labyrinth than a section of the tower.{x

its center and shallows out on either end.  Within

know their nature. The air which is also saturated
with the stench teems with similar filth creatures.{x

{8 The hatch leads to a small passageway, which is
{8 dark and stuffy. This must lead to the basement
{8 of Blackstaff Tower, a place you have heard of.{x

description: {x
{8Here, the hallway comes to an abrupt halt at a door
lined with red leather.  The leather is fastened in
brass hardware on what you guess to be a wood frame.
The door is slightly ajar possibly in an invitation.{x

32932.name: {xA {rNarrow {8Chute{x
description: It is dark as such tunnels are, though this one was
never meant to be traversed by anything as large as
you.  The way is shared by small vermin and insects
that bite.  Fortunately, they do keep to themselves.{x

of{y failsafe for preventing unfortunate deaths wi{8th

it{y is just the wind blowing upward from hitting {8on
th{ye tower side. In any event, it is fortunate th{8at

32929.name: {xA {rNarrow {8Chute{x
description: It is dark as such tunnels are, though this one was
never meant to be traversed by anything as large as
you.  The way is shared by small vermin and insects
that bite.  Fortunately, they do keep to themselves.{x

32849.name: {8The {cT{wo{Ww{we{cr {rC{ye{rss{8pit{x
description: Mind over matter.  That is what your mind tells
you but the matter in your stomach seems to beg
to differ. Keeping it down requires a great bit
of concentration, making it a challenge to move
onward. Letting it go will only add to the mess.{x

32947.name: {BVertical {yCorridor {WW{within {8the {RW{rall{x
description: {g
This narrow corridor goes straight up and down and
has the stench of sewage.  The walls are green and
brown and slimy and there are no handholds to grab.{x

description: {y
Perhaps it is only a few more steps that you will
find yourself on level ground once more. Trickles
of dirt fall from the ceiling occasionally as the
sound of a faint rumbling can be heard from above.{x

32860.name: {8The {cT{wo{Ww{we{cr {rC{ye{rss{8pit{x
description: {y
Further down the river of refuse you go, and at
this point you don't care where it ends up.  If
it leads to the den of trolls or orcs you don't
care, as long as you find some fresh air that's
free of the putrid smell and disease all around.{x

32662.name: {wTh{8e Bla{yckst{8aff Ro{wof{x

in{yto the horizon. A few small settlements lie alo{8ng
it{ys way as it cuts a faint scar across the land. {8An
od{yor of cooked meat lingers faintly in the air wi{8th
th{ye smoke from Waterdeep's hearths.  To be anywhe{8re
bu{yt here is an encouraging thought that perhaps y{8ou
should finish here and expediate your own departure.{x

32774.name: {RA {CP{Ba{Ms{Ys{8ag{Ye{Mw{Ba{Cy{x
description: {x
{8Cobwebs and torchstands are strewn about, none used in ages.{x

32561.name: {bC{Bha{2mb{@er of Po{2rt{Bal{bs{X
description: The cursed maze of portals is behind you.  You
stand now in an endless void of darkness.  The
only thing left to do now is enter the last of
the portals and leave this damned maze forever.
{X

32367.name: {WP{ga{yt{wh {xto {cBl{8ac{wks{Wtaf{wf T{8ow{cer{x
description: {cBl{8ac{wks{Wtaf{wf T{8ow{cer{c rises to the west.  This is a rather elaborate
path for such a simple tower, yet there's something compelling about
it at the same time.  The path is made with simple cobblestones, which
is a striking change from the finecut masonry of the other streets in
Waterdeep.  {x

32943.name: {8A {YDry {wL{8edge{x
description: {w
This ledge is a small niche made into the southern
end of the cesspit.  It seems to have been made on
purpose as there is a small opening downward which
is fitted with a ladder and covered with a grating.{x

32907.name: {BVertical {yCorridor {WW{within {8the {RW{rall{x
description: {g
This narrow corridor goes straight up and down and
has the stench of sewage.  The walls are green and
brown and slimy and there are no handholds to grab.{x

This elaborate system of caverns are in many ways just
as intriguing as they are strange. The red minerals of
which they get their unusual properties are sandwiched
with many colors, though red predominates the spectrum.{x

32427.name: {yC{8h{wa{Wm{wb{8e{yr {8of {wS{8t{ya{gt{yu{8e{ws{x
description: Whoever constructed this mad maze of statues was
surely a genius.  The rows of statues themselves
have been arranged to connect at extremely exact
angles.  The intricate carvings of every statue,
and the magical glow of the emerald eyes reflect
thousands of hours of tedious, intensive labors.{X

{BAnother bookcase sits bolted against the wall here. It holds

to travel - or does it? As one moves upward
through the tower, the line between what is
real and what is illusion becomes even more
blurred.  The choice to continue belongs to

solid refuse.  The older heaps are teeming with vermin

{B Along this side of the laboratory sits several
{B long tables with many different types of glass
{B and pottery. There is a gas lamp burning dimly

{B types of substances are heated and melted with
{B a crucible in order to learn about the effects

description: The  vastness of the hall you are in defies
description. The walls slant skyward beyond
visibility. Along and between the walls are
countless reptilian statues arranged into a
maze of mind boggling complexity.  Each and
every statue is slightly different from the
next, although each is equally frightening.
Carved from ancient grey stone, the statues
stare straight ahead.  The floor is utterly
silent except for the occasional sputter of
the everburning torches bolted on the wall.{X

furniture and plush carpet that is adorned with a huge
serpentine creature against an outdoor scene.  Here at
the entrance is a large wardrobe to hang clothes and a

in design. The walls are common flatstone pieced by
painstakingly precise cuts without mortar. A simple
rectangular door sits at the other end equally dark
and foreboding, accented with interwoven bands made
of black iron and riveted to the base. A fine layer
of dark red rust sits on the iron, untouched by nay
a mortal hand for perhaps centuries.  Atop the door
is a long, square keystone, upon which is engraved:

{8sharp corners.  The only light available is from whatever

be the skeletal remains of a small animal.  It's strange to see

The loose stone opens into a staircase which descends
into this small chamber.  It is round and dark except
for an illuminated pedestal at the center of the room.
On this pedistal is an old tome bound in dark leather
and opened.  It would appear that this room was built
for a sole purpose of keeping the dark tome in secret.{x

description: {WThe stairs comes to an abrupt halt here.  You have made a complete
circle around the tower, which at this point is alive in elaborate
decor, with many windows and stone decorations.  Here sits a large,
open window facing towards the tower.  The sill is wide, allowing one
to stand upon it and look out towards the tower.  You wonder what
would happend if you jumped...  {x

32391.name: {@T{2he {^S{7taircase{& in the {!W{1all{X
description: {7As you continue to climb the crumbling stairway and to explore the
black tower, you can't help but notice that despite it's enormous
size, the tower casts no shadow.  The distance between torches is
increasing as you climb, not helpful as the stairway seems to be in
the worse shape near the top.

description: The  vastness of the hall you are in defies
description. The walls slant skyward beyond
visibility. Along and between the walls are
countless reptilian statues arranged into a
maze of mind boggling complexity.  Each and
every statue is slightly different from the
next, although each is equally frightening.
Carved from ancient grey stone, the statues
stare straight ahead.  The floor is utterly
silent except for the occasional sputter of
the everburning torches bolted on the wall.{X

32440.name: the {gprophet{x~
description:
His face is wrinkled and sunken, almost ghastly.  He has long,
stringy hair, balding in spots and topped off with a pointed hood.  He
holds a gnarled walking stick and leans upon it for support.  His
robes are less robes than dirtied rags, torn at the feet where he has
snagged and trampled upon it.  He is dirtied from head to sandals, and
smells as if he hasn't touched water in many weeks.  When he speaks,
he does so with a cracked voice, from much shouting that those of his
profession do.
